name: Enion Online
description:
Enion Online is a thrilling mini MMORPG 3D browser-based game that will take you on an exciting adventure filled with epic battles, magic, and intense PvP combat. The game is set in a world where two ancient races, orcs, and humans, have been locked in a never-ending conflict for centuries. Players will be able to choose their side and join the battle as one of four unique classes: mage, warrior, priest, or assassin.

The game boasts stunning 3D graphics that allow players to immerse themselves in a vibrant and detailed world filled with towering mountains, dark forests, and ancient ruins. As players explore this vast world, they will encounter dangerous monsters and other players who will test their skills and combat prowess.

It is in pre-alpha stage

For the best experience play here:  http://alpha.enion.io

Feel free to join our Discord to tell us about your feedback: https://discord.com/invite/xV4Q2ncz
